app.services

Class CourseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.services.DaoService<ICourseDao>
      • app.services.CourseService

  • @Service
public class CourseService
extends DaoService<ICourseDao>
    Class as service represents Course. In this class contains all possible operations with course and should be used for that.
    Author:
    Mateusz Mucha
